assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: MedRx Co., Ltd, a pharmaceutical formulation development company, engages in the research and development of pharmaceutical drugs based on the transdermal absorption system in Japan. It develops medicines based on Ionic liquid transdermal system (ILTS). The company's products pipeline include MRX-4TZT, which is in phase I clinical trials for the treatment of spasticity; MRX-9FLT that is in phase II clinical trials to treat moderate-severe pain; MRX-10XT, which is in phase Ia clinical trials for the treatment of moderate-severe pain; and MRX-7MLL and MRX-6LDT that is in pre-clinical trials to treat Alzheimer's disease and chronic pain, as well as MRX-5LBT that has completed the clinical trials for the treatment of neuropathic pain. It also offers micro needle patches for delivery of vaccines and/or APIs through skin; and nano-sized colloid transdermal system (NCTS). The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Higashikagawa, Japan.
